## fuzzyMatch variable

Performs a fuzzy search of `query` in `domain` and returns `true` if successful.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fuzzyMatch: <T>(domain: ArrayLike<T>, query: ArrayLike<T>, equiv?: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<any, any, boolean>) => boolean
```

## Remarks

The optional `equiv` predicate can be used to customize item equality checking. Uses [equiv](./equiv.equiv.md) by default.

Adapted and generalized from: [https://github.com/bevacqua/fufuzzyzzysearch](https://github.com/bevacqua/fufuzzyzzysearch) (MIT)
